title: Authors and Citation
text: Kane D (2025). positron.tutorials: Tutorials Learning Positron Related Tools. R package version 0.0.1.9003, https://ppbds.github.io/positron.tutorials/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {positron.tutorials: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools},   author = {David Kane},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1.9003},   url = {https://ppbds.github.io/positron.tutorials/}, }

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: positron.tutorials collection tutorials working Positron. Covers scripts, Quarto documents, git, Github, Quarto websites. Makes extensive use tools tutorial.helpers package.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: install package CRAN: can install development version GitHub : positron.tutorials currently avaible CRAN.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: sevene tutorials package. paratheses title tutorial, show code running tutoria. Example: Positron Code (“01-code”). Introduces students Positron write R code simple scripts. Positron Quarto (“02-quarto”). Show students tricks working R code using Positron, also demonstrates Quarto documents. Terminal (“03-terminal”). basic introduction command line. using Windows, make sure install RTools first. Positron GitHub Introduction (“04-github-1”). Explain basics Git GitHub, mostly context Positron. Positron GitHub Advanced (“05-github-2”). Provide practice working Git/GitHub, including details use GitHub Pages. Quarto Websites Introduction (“06-websites-1”). Basics website construction using Quarto projects. Quarto Websites Advanced (“07-websites-2”). practice Quarto websites, focus splitting data analysis tasks separate files.

title: positron.tutorials (development version)
text: Use GitHub Pages publishing. Redo PNG files. Transition tutorials covering Positron instead RStudio.
